attributes.action: To give all students in years 12-13 EMA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the oppinion of myself and many others that the educational maintenance allowance system is simply absurd it is based on the fact that parents earning more than £30,000 a year give out up to £30 a week to there children either directly or through purchasing things for them, this is simply a lie . Thus i believe that there should be no wage limit on the minimal award,meaning all student's will receive at least the minimal £10 ,this will be a fair system. Sign up now and lets help Mr Brown make a good popular decision that is right for this nation and that will improve school attendance across all backgrounds   by rewarding all students who work hard at school
